Description:
Identifies IPs performing DNS lookups associated with common Tor proxies.

Author: Saw Winn Naung , Azure-Sentinel
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: DNS TOR Proxies
Query: sourcetype="zeek-dns" (query="tor2web.org" OR query="tor2web.com" OR query="torlink.co" OR query="onion.to" OR query="onion.ink" OR query="onion.cab" OR query="onion.nu" OR query="onion.link" OR query="onion.it" OR query="onion.city" OR query="onion.direct" OR query="onion.top" OR query="onion.casa" OR query="onion.plus" OR query="onion.rip" OR query="onion.dog" OR query="tor2web.fi" OR query="tor2web.blutmagie.de" OR query="onion.sh" OR query="onion.lu" OR query="onion.pet" OR query="t2w.pw" OR query="tor2web.ae.org" OR query="tor2web.io" OR query="tor2web.xyz" OR query="onion.lt" OR query="s1.tor-gateways.de" OR query="s2.tor-gateways.de" OR query="s3.tor-gateways.de" OR query="s4.tor-gateways.de" OR query="s5.tor-gateways.de" OR query="hiddenservice.net")
